name: Perspective (itch) (lolour0)
description:
Perspective is a puzzle prototype game in which you move letters around in order to form different shapes.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Features :

  • Launch the game.
  • Put your headphones on.
  • Make shapes.
  • Be satisfied.
  • Have a good.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

This Game was made in a single day for a game jam, using the unity game engine.
